bestBHT.bht: The lasting fragrance of Jesus' memorial permeates the entire world, serving as a testament for all who desire to leave their own permanent memorials. As the gospel spreads throughout the whole world, it acts as a memorial and testament to the faith, love, and duty of those who propagate it. This vivid illustration vividly portrays the future work of evangelization, revealing the profound impact and widespread reach of the Gospel message.

Philip Schaff: This graphic touch pictures the future work of evangelization; the gospel going out into the whole world.
On the important inferences from this verse, see note on Matthew 26:13.
Archibald T. Robertson: But this monument to Jesus fills the whole world still with its fragrance.
What a hint there is here for those who wish to leave permanent memorials.
John Gill: Verily I say unto you,.... And you may assure yourselves of the truth of it.
Wheresoever this Gospel, of the death and resurrection of Christ, shall be preached throughout the whole world, as it shall be.
[This] also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her; in remembrance of her, and her work, and in commendation of her faith, love, and duty.

bhtAttempts.bht: The fragrance of Jesus' memorial fills the world, leaving a permanent reminder for those who seek it. As the gospel spreads throughout the whole world, it acts as a memorial and testament to the faith, love, and duty of those who preach it. This verse serves as a powerful picture of the future work of evangelization, revealing the impact and reach of the Gospel message.

The lasting fragrance of Jesus' memorial permeates the entire world, serving as a testament for all who desire to leave their own permanent memorials. As the gospel spreads throughout the whole world, it acts as a memorial and testament to the faith, love, and duty of those who propagate it. This vivid illustration vividly portrays the future work of evangelization, revealing the profound impact and widespread reach of the Gospel message.

The world is filled with the lasting fragrance of Jesus' memorial, a reminder of the permanent memorials left by those who wish to leave their own mark. As the gospel spreads throughout the world, it becomes a memorial to the faith, love, and duty of those who proclaim it. This verse beautifully illustrates the future work of evangelization, showcasing the far-reaching impact and influence of the Gospel message.

The aroma of Jesus' memorial permeates the entire world, reminding us of the permanent memorials we can leave behind. As the gospel spreads, it becomes a testament to the faith, love, and duty of those who share it. This verse beautifully portrays the future work of evangelization, illustrating the profound impact and vast reach of the Gospel message.

The fragrance of Jesus' memorial fills the whole world and serves as a lasting reminder for those seeking to leave their own permanent memorials. As the gospel spreads throughout the entire world, it becomes a memorial to the faith, love, and duty of those who share it. This verse provides a vivid depiction of the future work of evangelization, highlighting the immense impact and global reach of the Gospel message.
